Description: Mosque lamp. Made of gilded and enamelled glass.
Curator's comments: wrong reg nr on label text Mosque lamp, gilded and enamelled Egypt, mid 14th century The floral decoration is similar to the lamp in case 19. It bears the emblem of a sword (silah) and therefore its owner (silahdar) was likely to be associated with the Mamluk court. 1884,0704.85
Bibliographic references: Lamm 1929-1930 / Mittelalterliche Gläser und Steinschnittarbeiten aus dem Nahen Osten (p.453)
